description: This dashboard provides a comprehensive analysis of errors filtered by Media ID. Use the Media ID filter to focus on specific media assets, examine error messages, and gain insights into platform-specific or device-specific error trends.

panels.description: The Success Rate measures player reliability as the ratio of START to ERROR events, excluding failures caused by blocked reasons,  unsupported DRM errors or connection errors.
panels.title: Success rate

panels.description: Repartition of error by platform for the selected time range.
panels.title: Errors distribution by platform

targets.query:
event_name:ERROR
AND NOT session.player.platform:android
AND session.media.id:${media_id}
AND data.business_error:false

event_name:ERROR
AND session.player.platform:$platform
AND session.player.platform:(Android OR Apple)
AND session.media.id:${media_id}
AND data.business_error:false
AND NOT data.error_type:(DRM_NOT_SUPPORTED OR CONNECTION_ERROR)

event_name:START
AND session.player.platform:$platform
AND session.player.platform:(Android OR Apple)
AND session.media.id:${media_id}

event_name:ERROR
AND session.player.platform:Web
AND session.media.id:${media_id}
AND data.business_error:false
AND NOT data.error_type:(DRM_NOT_SUPPORTED OR CONNECTION_ERROR)

title: Error Breakdown by media
